des: "This particular smoothie has a precise blend of flavors. Blueberry stands out with a hint of chestnut. This smoothie may be rich in carbs but it's incredibly delicious. Enjoy it after an intense workout or as a holiday treat."
ins: Place egg yolks, blueberries, coconut water, and chestnut puree in a blender; blend until smooth, 2 to 3 minutes.
